instruction: Create a short promotional video for a new eco-friendly water bottle that includes both product images and customer testimonials.
output: 1. Generate high-resolution images of the water bottle highlighting its eco-friendly features. 2. Generate audio recordings of customer testimonials praising the water bottle.

instruction: Write a detailed blog post about the benefits of meditation and embed guided meditation audio clips within the post.
output: 1. Generate a comprehensive text about the benefits of meditation. 2. Generate short, guided meditation audio clips to be embedded within the blog post.

instruction: Design a digital flyer for an upcoming tech conference, including schedule details and keynote speaker photos.
output: 1. Generate text content detailing the conference schedule and speakers. 2. Generate images of the keynote speakers to be included in the flyer.

instruction: Produce a podcast episode script about recent advancements in artificial intelligence, including soundbites from industry experts.
output: 1. Generate a detailed script for the podcast episode. 2. Generate audio soundbites from AI industry experts to include in the episode.

instruction: Create an educational video on the process of photosynthesis, consisting of animated diagrams and voiceover explanations.
output: 1. Generate animated diagrams illustrating the process of photosynthesis. 2. Generate a voiceover script explaining the diagrams.

instruction: Develop an interactive eBook for children about space exploration, featuring text, space images, and audio narration.
output: 1. Generate educational text about space exploration. 2. Generate high-quality images of space and celestial bodies. 3. Generate audio narration of the eBook content.

instruction: Craft a news article covering a recent sports event, complete with player interviews and action photographs.
output: 1. Generate text content for the news article detailing the event. 2. Generate audio recordings of player interviews. 3. Generate images capturing key moments of the event.

instruction: Produce a cooking show segment about making the perfect pizza, including step-by-step video instructions and a written recipe.
output: 1. Generate a video showing the step-by-step process of making pizza. 2. Generate a detailed text recipe to accompany the video.

instruction: Design an online advertisement for a fashion brand, incorporating catchy slogans and models showcasing the clothing.
output: 1. Generate catchy text slogans for the advertisement. 2. Generate images of models wearing the fashion brand's clothing.

instruction: Compile a tutorial on how to use a new software application, including screencast videos and a FAQ section.
output: 1. Generate screencast videos demonstrating key features of the software. 2. Generate text for a FAQ section addressing common user questions.

instruction: Create a jingle for a local bakery's advertisement, accompanied by images of their best-selling products.
output: 1. Generate a catchy audio jingle for the bakery. 2. Generate high-quality images of the bakery's best-selling products.

instruction: Develop a virtual museum tour video, including narrations over artworks and interactive text overlays with historical facts.
output: 1. Generate video footage of the museum's artworks. 2. Generate audio narrations explaining each artwork. 3. Generate interactive text overlays with historical facts.

instruction: Write a research paper on climate change effects on marine life, including data graphs and expert interviews.
output: 1. Generate a comprehensive text on climate change effects on marine life. 2. Generate data graphs illustrating research findings. 3. Generate audio recordings of expert interviews.

instruction: Design an instructional infographic on CPR techniques, incorporating step-by-step images and descriptive text.
output: 1. Generate descriptive text outlining CPR techniques. 2. Generate step-by-step images illustrating each CPR step.

instruction: Produce a travel vlog episode exploring a famous city, featuring narration, on-location shots, and pop-up text facts about landmarks.
output: 1. Generate video footage of on-location shots in the city. 2. Generate a narration script for the video. 3. Generate pop-up text facts about landmarks visited in the video.

instruction: Develop a mobile app tutorial video with voiceover explaining how to navigate the app, including UI screenshots.
output: 1. Generate a voiceover script explaining how to use the app. 2. Generate screenshots of the app's UI to include in the tutorial video.

instruction: Create an animated explainer video about the water cycle, including diagrams and a comprehensive voiceover explanation.
output: 1. Generate animated diagrams of the water cycle. 2. Generate a comprehensive voiceover script explaining the diagrams.

instruction: Compile an audio guide for learning a new language, including dialogues, vocabulary sections, and pronunciation exercises.
output: 1. Generate dialogues in the target language for audio recording. 2. Generate a list of vocabulary words with english translations for audio recording. 3. Generate pronunciation exercises for audio recording.

instruction: Produce an explainer video on how electric cars work, featuring 3D animations of the car's components and a technical voiceover.
output: 1. Generate 3D animations showing the components of an electric car. 2. Generate a technical voiceover script explaining how those components work.

instruction: Write an online course module on web development, including text lessons, coding challenge exercises, and video tutorials.
output: 1. Generate text-based lessons on web development topics. 2. Generate coding challenge exercises for practice. 3. Generate video tutorials explaining complex concepts.
